main.name: Godstime .O. Agho
main.description: I am a Software Engineer. I use React to structure frontend, Nodejs/Express for backend, mongodb, postgresql, firebase, AWS to manage your database with top-notch security. I am also grasping much needed knowledge on flutter for cross-platform mobile apps. This here, is my profile, can't really be exhaustive. But a one-to-one interaction with me, would actually be better. This project is one, that can be cloned & used from my github repo, but don't forget referencing.
main.bio: I'm godstime, but fondly called GT by many. I am a Software Engineer, an Administrative Manager / Co-founder at eespace Nigeria, and founder, Digit-Up Tech and i am a Media Consultant & enthusiast. I love helping people, making sure people feel safe around me and love using technology to get problem solved, that is  one of the major reason, i found myself in tech. Generally, i love technology, love travelling, making friends and i love seeing people happy.
main.contactmessage: I am just a call away to helping you show-case your business and that great ideal to the world. Just a Call!.
